title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 26.3 - Evaluations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 26.3 - Evaluations

State Regulations
(a) The
commissioner shall appoint representatives who shall visit the council's or
association's place of business for the purpose of evaluating fiscal, management, and technical policies and practices. (b) Such evaluations shall be conducted by
the department at such intervals as the commissioner may direct and at a time
selected by the commissioner. (c) A
full report of findings and recommendations shall be made to the entire board
of trustees of the council or association. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
26.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
